sen.j: 後柏原天皇（ごかしわばらてんのう、寛正5年10月20日（1464年11月19日）- 大永6年4月7日（1526年5月19日））は、室町時代、戦国時代の第104代天皇（在位：明応9年10月25日（1500年11月16日） - 大永6年4月7日（1526年5月19日）。
sen.e: Emperor Go-Kashiwabara (November 19th, 1464 - May 19th, 1526) was the 104th Emperor in the Muromachi and the Warring States period; the period of civil wars between rival daimyo. (his reign was November 16th, 1500 - May 19th, 1526.)

Emperor Go-Kashiwabara (November 19, 1464 - May 19, 1526) was the 104th Emperor, reigning from November 16, 1500 to May 19, 1526 in the Muromachi and Warring States periods, the latter being the period of civil wars between rival daimyo.

Emperor Gokashiwabara (November 19, 1464 - May 19, 1526) was the 104th Emperor, reigning from November 16, 1500 to May 19, 1526 in the Muromachi and Sengoku (warring states) periods, the latter being the period of civil wars between rival daimyo.
His first name was Katsuhito.

sen.j: しかしながら、応仁の乱後遺症の為、朝廷の財政は逼迫しており、即位の礼を行う事ができず、その費用調達の為に朝廷の儀式を中止するなど経費節約をし、本願寺実如や室町幕府の献金を受け即位22年目の1521年3月22日にようやく即位の礼を執り行うことができた。
sen.e: However after getting damage from the Onin War, the financial situation of Imperial Palace was fragile, they could not afford to have the enthronement ceremony, the Palace stopped some of the Imperial ceremonies to save money for the enthronement ceremony, finally on March 22nd 1521, after twenty two years after the succession to the throne, there was a ceremony held after collecting donations from Jitsunyo of Hongan-ji Temple and the Muromachi shogunate.

However, due to the damage from the Onin War, the financial situation of the Imperial Palace was fragile and the enthronement ceremony could not be afforded; therefore, the palace stopped some of the imperial ceremonies in order to save money for the enthronement ceremony, and finally, on March 22, 1521, 22 years after the succession to the throne, there was a ceremony held after collecting donations from Jitsunyo of Hongan-ji Temple and the Muromachi shogunate.

sen.j: 応仁の乱により、公卿は地方に離散し、朝廷の財政は窮乏し、天皇の権威も地に落ちていた非常につらい時代だったといえる。
sen.e: After the Onin War, Court nobles were broken up to the country area, the financial situation of the Imperial Palace was fragile, it was the hard time for the Emperor since he had not much authority through this period.
